english.segment1: Afraid to open my eyes. Horror of facing the day.
english.segment2: Mist of the morning is fading, while cancer burn in my bones. Horror of facing the pain.
english.segment3: Years ago I had plans, what to do with my life. But now it all is so futile.
english.segment4: Oh. again my fears come true. and painkillers are out of effect. To the pain I must reconcile.
english.segment5: The color of my desperation, if I wouldn't be heading to Christ. Would even be darker than now.
english.segment6: My dream is to wake one morning. without these tears of pain. Oh. why can't I just die?
